author: Ben Westcott and Serenitie Wang, CNN
title: China's wet markets are not what some people think they are
description: If you have ever been to shopping area where butchers and grocers sell fresh produce straight from the farm, then you have been to something that would, in some parts of the world, be called a wet market.
content:
Hong Kong (CNN)If you have ever been to shopping area where butchers and grocers sell fresh produce straight from the farm, then you have been to something that would, in some parts of the world, be called a wet market.
That might be surprising -- because re… [+5891 chars]
